DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study investigate safety tolerability single multiple daily ascend dos AZD3199 deliver dry powder via Turbuhaler inhaler healthy male Japanese subject assessment incidence nature adverse event ( AEs ) , clinically significant abnormality ECG parameter , blood pressure ( BP ) , pulse rate , lung function parameter , body temperature laboratory variable ( clinical chemistry , haematology urinalysis ) . The secondary objective study investigate pharmacokinetics ( PK ) single multiple ascend dos AZD3199 assessment degree accumulation , dose proportionality time linearity healthy Japanese subject , investigate systemic Î² 2- adrenoreceptor mediate effect single multiple ascend dos AZD3199 assessment potassium lactate concentration , tremor palpitation , heart rate , QTc , pulse rate , blood pressure FEV1 .
DOC.brief_title: Assess Safety , Tolerability PK AZD3199 Japanese
DOC.criteria: Be healthy Japanese volunteer , volunteer 's parent , grandparent must Japanese . The volunteer must bear Japan , valid Japanese passport must live outside Japan 5 year . BMI 18 27 , Weight 50 85 kg Be nonsmoker exsmoker stop smoke ( use nicotine product ) > 6 month prior study start . Clinical normal physical finding Any clinically significant disease disorder Any clinically relevant abnormal finding physical examination , clinical chemistry , haematology , urinalysis , vital sign , ECG lung function baseline Any clinically important abnormality rhythm , conduction morphology rest ECG may interfere interpretation QTc interval change . Use medication ( include OTC ) , herbal preparation , vitamin nutritional supplement within 2 week prior Visit 2 , except occasional intake paracetamol ( maximum daily dose 4 g )
